Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controls the flow of the game, does the main checks and updates. Version History - version 1.0, version 1.1, version 1.2, version 2.0 Filename: GameController.java
    Since:
    25-4-2020 copyright: No Copyright Purpose
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Ben Parker, Petko Kuzmanov, Sean Coaker

      • startGame

        public static void startGame(Profile passedProfile)
        Calls any methods that need to be called to set up once the game has been started.
        Parameters:
        passedProfile - - the user profile selected

      • initiateLevel

        public static void initiateLevel(int level)
        Sets all the appropriate class variables to those matching the new level.
        Parameters:
        level - - the level to start up. This number will be 100 + the level number for custom levels

        Makes each enemy do their next move.

                     throws java.io.IOException
        Saves the game contents to a file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an invalid file name is passed through

        Writes the text file of all the profile names and highest beaten levels.

                           java.lang.String userName,

        userName - - the player's username
        levelNo - - the number of the level

        movable - - the entity to take up the coordinates spot

      • getProfile

        public static Profile getProfile(java.lang.String profileName,
                                 int level)
        If the inputted name is a current existing profile, return it. Otherwise, create and return it.
        Parameters:
        profileName - - the name of the profile being checked
        level - - the highest level we know the profile has beaten without checking their profile object
        Returns:
        the new or existing user profile

      • getLevelMap

        public static java.lang.Object[][] getLevelMap()
        Gets the map's contents.
        Returns:
        a 2D array of objects, stored in the location of their map coordinates

      • objectify

        public static java.lang.String objectify(java.lang.String input,
                                         int data)
        Converts a text file url into the two-character map representation.
        Parameters:
        input - - the text file url
        data - - any needed additional data, for teleporter links and token door requirements
        Returns:
        the two-character string that represents it

        Returns:

      • setSoundVolume

        public static void setSoundVolume(double scaler)
        Sets the volume of each of the sound effects.
        Parameters:
        scaler - Used to increase or decrease the volume level.

      • setVictoryMusicVolume

        public static void setVictoryMusicVolume(double scaler)
        Sets the volume of the victory music.
        Parameters:
        scaler - Used to increase or decrease the volume level.

      • playDoorSound

        public static void playDoorSound()
        Method which plays the door opening sound effect. This is used when a user changes the sound effects volume slider in the audio settings window. This method then plays the door opening sound at the new volume for reference.

      • setTime

        public static void setTime(int t)
        Sets the time of the timer. Used for resuming the game after pause so that we can keep track of where the timer was.
        Parameters:
        t - Time in seconds.
